name: David Huff
description:
I am a witty, intelligent, loyal, faithful and honest man. I am a listener, a talker and a great friend. I can be a bit shy. I am a lover not a fighter, very affectionate and appreciate a woman who is the same.I like to hold hands in public and would like a lady that does too. Love to cuddle with my lady anytime.I don’t like confrontation. I am not demanding or high maintenance. I am independent but miss having a real woman to love and experience life with. Love to ride my motorcycle when I am not at work..
I like going out for the night and also happy to stay home with my lady, a dud and cuddling. Love listening to most kinds of music.
